 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Data.ByteString.Unsafe_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import Data.ByteString.Unsafe
 6: import Data.ByteString_LHAssumptions()
 7: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 8: 
 9: {-@
10: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeHead
11:     :: { bs : Data.ByteString.ByteString | 1 <= bslen bs } -> _
12: 
13: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeTail
14:     :: bs : { v : Data.ByteString.ByteString | bslen v > 0 }
15:     -> { v : Data.ByteString.ByteString | bslen v = bslen bs - 1 }
16: 
17: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeInit
18:     :: { bs : Data.ByteString.ByteString | 1 <= bslen bs } -> _
19: 
20: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeLast
21:     :: { bs : Data.ByteString.ByteString | 1 <= bslen bs } -> _
22: 
23: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeIndex
24:     :: bs : Data.ByteString.ByteString
25:     -> { n : Int | 0 <= n && n < bslen bs }
26:     -> _
27: 
28: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeTake
29:     :: n : { n : Int | 0 <= n }
30:     -> i : { i : Data.ByteString.ByteString | n <= bslen i }
31:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.ByteString | bslen o == n }
32: 
33: assume Data.ByteString.Unsafe.unsafeDrop
34:     :: n : { n : Int | 0 <= n }
35:     -> i : { i : Data.ByteString.ByteString | n <= bslen i }
36:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.ByteString | bslen o == bslen i - n }
37: @-}
